buildCommand: flutter/bin/flutter build web --release --no-tree-shake-icons --dart-define=SUPABASE_URL=$SUPABASE_URL --dart-define=SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=$SUPABASE_ANON_KEY && cp -r assets/images/drama_sutra build/web/assets/assets/images/
installCommand: git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git -b stable --depth 1 && flutter/bin/flutter config --enable-web && flutter/bin/flutter pub get
